summary: Digital marketing website with sections for services, portfolio/case studies, client testimonials, and contact form
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- A B Digital Craft logo with black 'A', purple 'B' interlocking design, 'DIGITAL CRAFT' text in purple, and tagline 'YOUR SUCCESS DIGITAL PARTNER' in gray, optimized for web header display (ab-digital-logo.dim_800x600.png)

existing_features.title: Create a hero section with compelling headline, subheadline describing digital marketing expertise, and a prominent call-to-action button

Build a services section displaying digital marketing offerings including SEO, social media marketing, content marketing, PPC advertising, email marketing, and analytics with descriptions for each service
Create a portfolio section showcasing case studies with project titles, client names, brief descriptions of work done, and results achieved
Build a testimonials section displaying client feedback with client names, company names, and testimonial text
Create a contact form with fields for name, email, phone number, service interest, and message, with form validation

Design a creative, professional visual theme with sophisticated color palette (avoiding blue and purple), elegant typography, and modern layout that conveys expertise and trustworthiness appropriate for a digital marketing agency
Update the HTML document title from 'Digital Marketing' to 'A B Digital Craft' in frontend/index.html

Replace the hero section headline to prominently feature 'A B Digital Craft' as the company name with the tagline 'Your Success Digital Partner', maintaining the existing layout and brand color styling

Integrate the uploaded A B Digital Craft logo (featuring black 'A', purple 'B', and full branding lockup) into the website header or hero section as a static asset rendered from frontend/public/assets/generated/ab-digital-logo.png
Update the Footer component to display 'A B Digital Craft' as the copyright holder instead of a generic name, maintaining the existing copyright year and caffeine.ai attribution

new_feature_requests.summary: Services section showcasing digital marketing offerings
Implement backend storage for contact form submissions with fields for name, email, phone, service interest, message, and timestamp
